onAddButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.project.rupizzeriagui.PizzaCustomizationController
Adds a topping to the pizza if the pizza has less than 7 toppings and creates an alert if the user tries to add more than 7 toppings.

Adds pizza to the order and creates an alert informing the user that a pizza has been added to the order.

onCurrentOrderButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.project.rupizzeriagui.MainMenuController
Opens the Current Order GUI and creates a new order if the phone number provided is not associated with an existing order.
